title: Samsung's new 8K bezel-less and rotating TVs at CES 2020
description: At CES 2020, Samsung announced its new lineup of TVs. At the top is a stunning 8K QLED TV with bezels that are nearly invisible. And theres also The Sero, a 43-inch TV that rotates vertically to play content from your phone.
